stories.text:
Peter Park is a thriving and fast growing B2B-startup based in Munich. As Germany’s leading developer of a SaaS parking solution, our goal is to replace old fashioned barriers, paper tickets and parking discs with free flow and seamless payment solutions. We are looking for Developers who want to join us in expanding our smart IoT infrastructure and conquer the European market. We foster talent and appreciate excellence. As such, we strongly encourage initiative, innovative thinking, openness to learning and intellectual curiosity. We are looking for proactive and success-driven people to complete our striving international team. English is mandatory.

Please use the application sheet within the respective job description.

We are looking forward to hearing from you!

Open positions (m/f/d):

Senior Backend Developer: https://peter-park.jobs.personio.de/job/399436

Backend Developer: https://peter-park.jobs.personio.de/job/399445

Working Student Backend Developer: https://peter-park.jobs.personio.de/job/399425

Frontend Developer: https://peter-park.jobs.personio.de/job/399446

Senior Fullstack Developer: https://peter-park.jobs.personio.de/job/399447
